---
name: 功能请求 / Feature Request
about: 建议一个新功能 / Suggest a new feature
title: '[FEATURE] '
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## 功能描述 / Feature Description

简洁清晰地描述你想要的功能。
A clear and concise description of what you want.

## 问题背景 / Problem Background

这个功能能解决什么问题？是否与某个问题相关？
What problem does this feature solve? Is it related to a problem?

例如：我总是感到沮丧当 [...]
Ex. I'm always frustrated when [...]

## 期望的解决方案 / Desired Solution

描述你期望的解决方案。
Describe the solution you'd like.

## 备选方案 / Alternatives

描述你考虑过的任何备选方案或功能。
Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## 使用场景 / Use Cases

描述这个功能的使用场景和目标用户。
Describe the use cases and target users for this feature.

## 额外信息 / Additional Context

添加关于功能请求的任何其他信息或截图。
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.

## 实现建议 / Implementation Suggestions

如果你有关于如何实现此功能的想法，请在这里分享：
If you have ideas on how to implement this feature, please share here:
